A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Putrid garbage. Not worth your time. Completely DESTROYED the entire story arc!!!Destruction of customs and tradition - Yoda burning the Jedi Order books (destroying religion).
Luke throwing the light saber away. 
Constant message to "kill the past."
The overall message is that the universe is meaningless. 

Destruction of family - Rays family end up being nobodies who sold her for drinking money. But since Ray is awesome at everything she does\, the messsage is that families are not important to the success of a person which is moronic. That expanation also does not explain WHY Rey is so powerful. At least if she were related to Luke then that would partially explain it. 

Destruction of fatherhood: Luke is made to look like an idiot. Of course Ray bests him and knocks him to the ground and decides to spare him. 

Girls can do anything

Girls don't have to train to be really great at something. They can just DO whatever they want. 

Men are stupid

Men can only think about blowing things up

Families don't matter. Blood doesn't matter. You can do anything you want. 

Mixed messages- we are supposed to believe that a patricidal character deserves our sympathy. Another example of Hollywood trying to confuse people so they can't discern between good and evil.
